title: How To Build Scalable and Reliable CI/CD Pipelines With Kubernetes
author: Neha Surendranath
description: By integrating CI/CD pipelines with Kubernetes, organizations can deploy applications in a scalable, consistent, and resilient manner.
cntitle: 如何使用 Kubernetes 构建可扩展且可靠的 CI/CD 流水线
cndescription: 通过将 CI/CD 管道与 Kubernetes 集成，组织可以以可扩展、一致和弹性的方式部署应用程序。
